summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 3, Thomas' Division of Green Lake Addition, being the alley between Roosevelt Way and 11th Avenue Northeast, from East 80th Street to East 82nd Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 12888 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
